thread.title: Dirt-powered sensors help farmers optimize their fields

author: Voice of America
title: Dirt-powered sensors help farmers optimize their fields
text: Dirt-powered sensors help farmers optimize their fieldsAn innovative solution to remotely power devices using natural biological processes could help farmers get the most from their fields. VOA’s Kane Farabaugh has more. » Subscribe to VOA News: https://bit.ly/3KIPysi » Watch more VOA News video: https://www.youtube.com/voanews Voice of America (VOA) is the largest U.S. international broadcaster, providing news and information in more than 40 languages to an estimated weekly audience of 236.8 million people.
